name: genesiscloud
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing genesiscloud cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`genesiscloud` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/genesiscloud/terraform-provider-genesiscloud).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing genesiscloud cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/genesiscloud/terraform-provider-genesiscloud)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-genesiscloud` repo](https://github.com/genesiscloud/pulumi-genesiscloud/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-genesiscloud` repo](https://github.com/genesiscloud/terraform-provider-genesiscloud/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/genesiscloud/terraform-provider-genesiscloud)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-genesiscloud` repo](https://github.com/genesiscloud/pulumi-genesiscloud/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-genesiscloud` repo](https://github.com/genesiscloud/terraform-provider-genesiscloud/issues).

endpoint.description:
Genesis Cloud API endpoint. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_ENDPOINT` environment variable. If neither is
provided, defaults to `https://api.genesiscloud.com/compute/v1`.

pollingInterval.description:
The polling interval. - The string must be a positive [time duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration), for
example "10s".

token.description: Genesis Cloud API token. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_TOKEN` environment variable.

create.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours).

delete.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours). Setting a timeout for a Delete operation is only applicable if changes are saved into state before the destroy operation occurs.

read.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours). Read operations occur during any refresh or planning operation when refresh is enabled.

update.description: A string that can be [parsed as a duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration) consisting of numbers and unit suffixes, such as "30s" or "2h45m". Valid time units are "s" (seconds), "m" (minutes), "h" (hours).

region.description:
Filter by the region identifier.
  - The value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

type.description:
Filter by the kind of image.
  - The value must be one of: ["base-os" "cloud-image" "preconfigured" "snapshot"].

createdAt.description: The timestamp when this image was created in RFC 3339.

id.description: A unique number that can be used to identify and reference a specific image.

name.description: The display name that has been given to an image.

regions.description: The list of regions in which this image can be used in.

versions.description: The list of versions if this is a cloud-image otherwise empty.

direction.description:
The direction of the rule.
  - The value must be one of: ["egress" "ingress"].

portRangeMax.description:
The maximum port number of the rule.
  - The value must be between 1 and 65535.

portRangeMin.description:
The minimum port number of the rule.
  - The value must be between 1 and 65535.

protocol.description:
The protocol of the rule.
  - The value must be one of: ["all" "icmp" "tcp" "udp"].

provider.description:
The provider type for the genesiscloud package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

endpoint.description:
Genesis Cloud API endpoint. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_ENDPOINT` environment variable. If neither is
provided, defaults to `https://api.genesiscloud.com/compute/v1`.

pollingInterval.description:
The polling interval. - The string must be a positive [time duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration), for
example "10s".

token.description: Genesis Cloud API token. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_TOKEN` environment variable.

endpoint.description:
Genesis Cloud API endpoint. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_ENDPOINT` environment variable. If neither is
provided, defaults to `https://api.genesiscloud.com/compute/v1`.

pollingInterval.description:
The polling interval. - The string must be a positive [time duration](https://pkg.go.dev/time#ParseDuration), for
example "10s".

token.description: Genesis Cloud API token. May also be provided via `GENESISCLOUD_TOKEN` environment variable.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when this filesystem was created in RFC 3339.

description.description: The human-readable description for the filesystem. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

mountBasePath.description: The base path on the server under which the mount point can be accessed.

mountEndpointRanges.description: The start and end IP of the mount endpoint range. Expressed as a array with two entries.

name.description: The human-readable name for the filesystem.

region.description:
The identifier for the region this filesystem exists in. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will
destroy and recreate the resource. - The value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

retainOnDelete.description: Flag to retain the filesystem when the resource is deleted - Sets the default value "false" if the attribute is not set.

size.description:
The storage size of this filesystem given in GiB. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and
recreate the resource. - The value must be at least 1.

type.description:
The storage type of the filesystem. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource. - The value must be one of: ["vast"].

description.description: The human-readable description for the filesystem. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

name.description: The human-readable name for the filesystem.

region.description:

destroy and recreate the resource. - The value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

retainOnDelete.description: Flag to retain the filesystem when the resource is deleted - Sets the default value "false" if the attribute is not set.

size.description:
The storage size of this filesystem given in GiB. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and
recreate the resource. - The value must be at least 1.

type.description:
The storage type of the filesystem. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource. - The value must be one of: ["vast"].

createdAt.description: The timestamp when this floating IP was created in RFC 3339.

description.description: The human-readable description set for the floating IP. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the floating IP.

isPublic.description: Whether the floating IP is public or private. - Sets the default value "true" if the attribute is not set.

name.description: The human-readable name for the floating IP.

region.description:
The region identifier. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource. - The
value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when this image was last updated in RFC 3339.

version.description:
The version of the floating IP. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource. - The value must be one of: ["ipv4"].

description.description: The human-readable description set for the floating IP. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

name.description: The human-readable name for the floating IP.

value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

description.description: The human-readable description set for the floating IP. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

isPublic.description: Whether the floating IP is public or private. - Sets the default value "true" if the attribute is not set.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when this image was last updated in RFC 3339.

version.description:
The version of the floating IP. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource. - The value must be one of: ["ipv4"].

createdAt.description: The timestamp when this image was created in RFC 3339.

diskSize.description: The disk size of the instance in GB.

floatingIpId.description: The floating IP attached to the instance.

hostname.description:
The hostname of your instance. If not provided will be initially set to the `name` attribute. - If the value of this
attribute is configured and changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource.

image.description:
The source image id, image slug or snapshot id of the instance. The image version can also specified together with the
image slug in this format `<image-slug>:<version>`. Learn more about images
[here](https://developers.genesiscloud.com/images). - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and
recreate the resource.

imageId.description: The resulting image ID of the instance.

metadata.description: Option to provide metadata. Currently supported is `startup_script`.

name.description: The human-readable name for the instance.

password.description:
The password to access the instance. Your password must have upper and lower chars, digits and length between 8-72.
**Please Note**: Only one of `ssh_keys` or `password` can be provided. Password is less secure - we recommend you use an
SSH key-pair. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource. - The string
length must be at least 16.

placementOption.description:
The placement option identifier in which instances are physically located relative to each other within a zone. For
example A or B. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource.

region.description:
The region identifier. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource. - The
value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

securityGroupIds.description: The security groups of the instance. If not provided will be set to the default security group.

sshKeyIds.description:
The ssh keys of the instance. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource.

type.description:
The instance type identifier. Learn more about instance types
[here](https://developers.genesiscloud.com/instances#instance-types). - If the value of this attribute changes,
Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource.

name.description: The human-readable name for the volume.

region.description:
The region identifier. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the resource. - The
value must be one of: ["ARC-IS-HAF-1" "EUC-DE-MUC-1" "NORD-NO-KRS-1"].

retainOnDelete.description: Flag to retain the volume when the resource is deleted - Sets the default value "false" if the attribute is not set.

size.description:
The storage size of this volume given in GiB. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and
recreate the resource. - The value must be at least 1.

type.description:
The storage type of the volume. - If the value of this attribute changes, Terraform will destroy and recreate the
resource. - The value must be one of: ["hdd" "ssd"].

description.description: The human-readable description for the volume. - Sets the default value "" if the attribute is not set.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Volume resources.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when this volume was created in RFC 3339.

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking Images.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by Images.
